column1: My suspicion (and I caution this is just a SUSPICION, not in ANY way authoritative, I REPEAT DO NOT PARSE THIS AS FACT) is that it's another coronavirus, but specifically *not* a betacoronavirus this time. https://twitter.com/charlesmok/status/1214223394163478528 …

To any virologists or similar interested parties: the draft genetic sequence of Wuhan pneumonia novel coronavirus has been released & is available here for analysis: http://virological.org/t/initial-genome-release-of-novel-coronavirus/319 …
